roleset.name: the force of one surface rubbing against another

example.name: alias-v
example.text: If an Acme Power Screw has a friction of 0.1 and Helix angle of 20 degrees, what is the expected efficiency of this Power Screw?

example.name: friction-n
example.text: Despite recent progress, a detailed understanding of water/solid friction in connection with the structure and energetics of the solid surface is lacking.

roleset.note: FRICTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.

roleset.name: conflict

example.name: friction-n
example.text: Has there been any friction with her over the years because of your devotion to your job?
example.arg: because of your devotion to your job?

roleset.note: FRICTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.
